name: Blueberry Blast
description: My first game using  construct and on itch. Made myself do this in three days. sadly no sound, but I got most of the stuff I wanted to get done done. this was very fun to make! The main character is a mix of Kirby and a pea shooter. Shoot the weeds to protect them from getting into the garden! You can also upgrade "helpers" by clicking the sprite with then x0 beside it. It goes up the more upgrades you buy for it. [CONTROLS] Up and down arrow keys to go up and down, space to shoot.
